divs: Sighting DetailsI AROSE AT 3AAM IN MORNING MY ATTENTION WAS DRAWN TO THIS WONDERFUL SIGHT OF ALARGE OUTER RING OF LIGHTS WITH AN INNER RING , SLOWLY REVOLVING AND THEN MOVINGTO RIGHT AND BACK AGAIN , I AWOKE MY WIFE AND WE JUST STOOD AT THEWINDOW WATCHING IN WONDERMENT AT THIS SIGHT, WE OBSERVED THIS JUST AT OVER TREETOP LEVEL,AT FIRST WE THOUGHT MAYBE IT WAS SOME SORT OF LASER EFECT BUT WE LIVEIN THE HEART OF THE COUNTRYSIDE, SO THERE WAS NO QUESTION OF ANY OTHER MAN MADETHING CREATING THIS ,IT JUST HOVERED WITH THE INNER AND OUTER RING OF LIGHTSSLOWLY REVOLVING AND THEN AGAIN MOVING SAY A FEW HUNDRED FEET TO THE LEFT ANDBACK AGAIN IT WAS IN SIGHT FOR 45 MINUTES OR MORE THEN AGAIN SLOWLY,MOVED OFFSOUTH WEST,OUR OBSERVATION WAS DUE SOUTH,WE HAVE SINCE BEEN TRYING TO FIND ALOGICAL REASON FOR THIS BUT CANT SO FELT I MUST CONTACT SOMEONE AND TELL THEM OFTHIS TRULY I CAN ONLY EXPLAIN IT AS A CALMING WONDEFUL MOMENT , I LOOK OUT EVERYEARLY MORNING HOPING FOR A RETURN OF THIS PHENOMINA ,PLEASE CONTACT AND LET USHAVE YOUR VEIWS ON THIS .IS THERE ANYONE IN YHIS PART OF fRANCE WE COULD TALK TOABOUT THIS.SINCERELY YOURS GRAHAM PAULINE WINSTON
